text: Héctor Epalza Quintero (4 June 1940 - 2 February 2021) was a Colombian Roman Catholic bishop. Epalza Quintero was born in Bogota, Colombia. He became a priest in 1965. He was bishop of the Roman Catholic Diocese of Buenaventura, Colombia from 2004 until 2017. Epalza Quintero died on 2 February 2021 in Buenaventura, Columbia at the age of 80.Héctor Epalza Quintero ==References== Category:1940 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Colombian Roman Catholic bishops Category:People from Bogotá
title: Héctor Epalza Quintero
